meta.description: Comprehensive tag vocabulary for TruthAngel/Quarex cross-library discovery

tiers.medium: Cross-domain conceptual lenses and analytical frameworks (max 100)
tiers.specific: Concrete subject-matter categories used to classify Books (max 250)

meta.usage: Tags apply at the Chapter level. Each Chapter should receive exactly 4 tags.
